text.font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif
ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif
ui-serif, Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif
text.tspan: “It is only with the heart that one can see rightly;
what is essential is invisible to the eye.”

text.font-family: ui-serif, Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif
